name: src/mass.js
Mass
description: Class for working with string representations of mass.

params.name: units
params.description: Array of mass unit definitions objects.

unknown.tagValue: {(number|false)} Returns mass as it's base unit, if an invalid string for mass or any value is negative, false.

return.description: Returns mass as it's base unit, if an invalid string for mass or any value is negative, false.

unknown.tagValue: {(string|undefined)} Formatted mass string or undefined if unit signifier string lookup fails.

params.name: value
params.description: Value to format (must be a positive number).

params.name: unitValue
params.description: Value of unit or string mass unit signifier for lookup.

return.description: Formatted mass string or undefined if unit signifier string lookup fails.

throws.description: Will throw an error if value or unitValue are a negative number.

name: lookup
description: Lookup string signifier returning matching Unit.

params.name: signifier
params.description: Mass unit signifier string for lookup.

return.description: Matching Unit object, if found, otherwise false.

name: src/SI.js
Units
description: International System of Units units of mass

name: src/UK.js
src/US.js

content:
[![Coverage Status](https://coveralls.io/repos/github/MeekLogic/Mass.js/badge.svg?branch=master)](https://coveralls.io/github/MeekLogic/Mass.js?branch=master) [![Build Status](https://travis-ci.com/MeekLogic/Mass.js.svg?branch=master)](https://travis-ci.com/MeekLogic/Mass.js)

Mass.js
=========
JavaScript library for parsing and formatting mass units.

**[Documentation](https://meeklogic.github.io/Mass.js/)**

Install
-------
```javascript
npm install mass.js
```

Usage
-----
```javascript
import Mass from 'mass.js';
```

System of Units
--------------
Default system for units of mass is **U.S. customary** but can be changed by requiring an alternative entry point (*US*, *UK*, or *SI*).

```javascript
import Mass from 'mass.js/src/US'; // U.S. customary
import Mass from 'mass.js/src/UK'; // Imperial
import Mass from 'mass.js/src/SI'; // International System of Units (unfinished)
```

Example
-------
```javascript
// Parse string for mass
let value = Mass.parse('10 ounces');

console.log(value); // 0.625

// Add 10 pounds
value += 10;

console.log(value); // 10.625

// Format total for human-readable string
console.log(Mass.format(value)); // "10 lb 10 oz"
```
name: ./README.md

content:
{
  "name": "mass.js",
  "version": "1.1.0",
  "description": "JavaScript library for parsing and formatting mass units.",
  "homepage": "https://meeklogic.github.io/Mass.js/",
  "main": "./src/US.js",
  "scripts": {
    "lint": "./node_modules/.bin/eslint --config ./.eslintrc.js ./src",
    "tests": "npm run tests",
    "tests:coverage": "npm run tests:coverage",
    "speed": "npm run performance",
    "performance": "node -r esm ./scripts/performance.js",
    "docs": "npm run documentation",
    "documentation": "npx esdoc",
    "example": "node ./scripts/example.js"
  },
  "keywords": [
    "mass",
    "unit",
    "imperial",
    "metric",
    "ton",
    "pound",
    "ounce",
    "weight"
  ],
  "repository": {
    "type": "git",
    "url": "git+https://github.com/MeekLogic/Mass.js"
  },
  "bugs": {
    "url": "https://github.com/MeekLogic/Mass.js/issues"
  },
  "author": "MeekLogic (Tyler Vigario)",
  "license": "GPL-3.0-only",
  "devDependencies": {
    "ava": "^2.4.0",
    "esdoc": "^1.1.0",
    "esdoc-standard-plugin": "^1.0.0",
    "eslint": "^6.5.1",
    "esm": "^3.2.25",
    "microtime": "^3.0.0",
    "nyc": "^14.1.1"
  },
  "dependencies": {},
  "ava": {
    "require": [
      "esm"
    ]
  }
}
